entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
